Text:
I have uploaded the next episode to monova since the upload function here doesn't work at the moment.

The episode I uploaded is labelled as The Bridge S01E03 since the CTV website says that the 2 hour premiere on Mar 5 was 2 episodes.

The comment function here won't let me post the link. So to find the torrent, search google with:

the bridge s01e03 fat

and click the link from the monova site (currently the first link in the google results)

The title of The Bridge S01E03 is "The Fat Lady Sings the Blues". The resolution is 512x384 and the quality is watchable.

I will upload the torrent to TPB when upload functionality returns.
